text: A catacomb is an underground tunnel that is used to hold and bury dead bodies. Many of them were made in the Roman Empire. ==In popular culture== ===Music=== The Catacombs is the eighth movement from Pictures at an Exhibition by Modest Mussorgsky. It describes of loud and soft sounds of echoes in catacombs. ==Related pages== * Tomb * Crypt * Cemetery Category:Cemeteries
title: Catacomb
